All Classes

Class Description
ApplicationUtils
Utility functions required across the application.
CapacityFullException
Exception thrown when more workers are created than the assigned capacity to the resource manager.
FormatTest  
HeartbeatClientRunnable
Heartbeat Client connection logic to be used for generating master-side thread per worker.
HeartbeatManager
Implementation of IHeartBeatManager.
HeartbeatServerRunnable
Heartbeat Server connection logic to be used for generating worker-side thread.
IHeartBeatManager
Interface for component managing heartbeat.
IHeartBeatManager.Mode
Used by the implementation to identify the mode it is to work in and corresponding business logic (Runnable) to implement.
IResourceManager
Interface for component managing worker processes (resource).
ITaskExecutor
Interface for the execution to be done by the worker once task is allocated to it by the master.
ITaskManager
Interface for the component that manages task allocation and availability.
Master  
MergerSorter  
NoTaskAvailableException
Exception thrown when there is no task available to allocate.
ResourceManager
Implementation of IResourceManager.
Task
Represents a single unit of task allocated by the word count master to the worker that it needs to execute and notify completed.
TaskAllocationClient
Worker client to request task allocation from master.
TaskAllocationServer
Handles task allocation requests from workers and calls TaskManager to allocate tasks to them.
TaskManager
Implementation of ITaskManager.
TestUtil  
WordCount  
WordCounter  
Worker  
WorkerInstantiationException
Exception thrown when there is failure in creating worker process.
WorkerTest
